Verses: 1 mose Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaar Ellaaraiyum Koodivaraseydhu, Avargalai Nokki:
2 neengal Aarunaal Velaiseyya Vendum, Ezhaamnaalo Ungalukkup Parisuththa Naalaai Iruppadhaaga; Adhu Karththarukkendru Oindhirukkum Oivunaal; Adhile Velaiseygiravan Evanum Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan.
3 oivunaalil Ungal Vaasasthalangalil Engum Neruppu Moottaadhiruppeergalaaga Ennum Ivvaarththaigalaik Kaikkollumbadi Karththar Kattalaiyittaar Endraan.
4 pinnum Mose Isravel Puththiraraagiya Sabaiyaar Ellaaraiyum Nokki:

5 ungalukku Undaanadhile Karththarukku Oru Kaanikkaiyaik Konduvandhu Seluththungal; Manamullavan Evano, Avan Adhaik Konduvarattum; Karththarukkuch Seluththum Kaanikkai Ennavendraal, Ponnum, Velliyum, Vengalamum,
6 ilaneelanoolum, Raththaambaranoolum, Sivappunoolum, Melliya Panjunoolum, Vellaattu Mayirum,
7 sivappuththeerndha Aattukkadaaththolum, Thakasuththolum, Seeththim Maramum,
8 vilakkukku Enneyum, Abishega Thailaththukkup Parimalavarkkangalum, Thoobaththukkuch Sugandhavarkkangalum,
9 aasaariyarudaiya Epoththilum Maarppadhakkaththilum Padhikkaththakka Komedhagam Mudhaliya Raththinangalume.
10 ungalil Gnaana Irudhayamulla Anaivarum Vandhu, Karththar Kattalaiyittavaigalaiyellaam Seyvaargalaaga.
11 vaasasthalaththaiyum, Adhin Koodaaraththaiyum, Adhin Moodiyaiyum, Adhin Kokkigalaiyum, Adhin Palagaigalaiyum, Adhin Thaazhppaalgalaiyum, Adhin Thoongalaiyum, Adhin Paadhangalaiyum,
12 pettiyaiyum, Adhin Thandugalaiyum, Kirubaasanaththaiyum, Maraivin Thiraichcheelaiyaiyum,
13 mejaiyaiyum, Adhin Thandugalaiyum, Adhin Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum, Samugaththappangalaiyum,
14 velichchangodukkum Kuththuvilakkaiyum, Adhin Karuvigalaiyum, Adhin Akalgalaiyum, Velichchaththukku Enneyaiyum,
15 thoobabeedaththaiyum, Adhin Thandugalaiyum, Abishegathailaththaiyum, Sugandha Thoobavarkkaththaiyum, Vaasasthalaththin Vaasalukkuth Thongudhiraiyaiyum,
16 thagana Balibeedaththaiyum, Adhin Vengalach Challataiyaiyum, Adhin Thandugalaiyum, Adhin Sagala Panimuttugalaiyum, Thottiyaiyum, Adhin Paadhaththaiyum,
17 piraakaaraththin Thongudhiraigalaiyum, Adhin Thoongalaiyum, Adhin Paadhangalaiyum, Piraagaaraththu Vaasalin Thongudhiraiyaiyum,
18 vaasasthalaththin Mulaigalaiyum, Piraagaaraththin Mulaigalaiyum, Avaigalin Kayirugalaiyum,

19 parisuththa Sthalaththile Aaraadhanai Seyvadharkuriya Vasthirangalaiyum, Aasaariya Oozhiyanjeygira Aaronin Parisuththa Vasthirangalaiyum, Avan Kumaararin Vasthirangalaiyum Avargal Seyyakkadavargal Endraan.
20 appozhudhu Isravel Puththiraraaigya Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Moseyin Samugaththaivittup Purappattaargal.

21 pinbu Evargalai Avargal Irudhayam Ezhuppi, Evargalai Avargal Aavi Utchaagappaduththinadho, Avargal Ellaarum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththin Velaikkum Adhin Sagala Oozhiyaththukkum, Parisuththa Vasthirangalukkum Etravaigalaik Karththarukkuk Kaanikkaiyaagak Konduvandhaargal.

22 manappoorvamulla Sthiree Purushar Yaavarum, Asthakadagangal, Kaadhanigal, Modhirangal, Aarangal Mudhalaana Sagala Vidha Ponnaabaranangalaiyum Konduvandhaargal; Karththarukkuk Kaanikkai Seluththina Ovvoruvanum Ponnaik Kaanikkaiyaagach Seluththinaan.

23 ilaneelanoolaiyum Rathtbaampara Noolaiyum Sivappunoolaiyum Melliya Panju Noolaiyum Vellaattu Mayiraiyum Sivappuththeerndha Aattukkadaath Tholaiyum Thakasuththolaiyum Thangalidaththil Vaiththirundha Yaavarum Avaigalaik Konduvandhaargal.

24 velliyaiyum Vengalaththaiyum Kodukkaththakka Yaavarum Avaigalaik Karththarukkuk Kaanikkaiyaagak Konduvandhaargal. Parpala Velaigalukku Udhavum Seeththim Maraththaith Thangalidaththil Vaiththirundha Yaavarum Avaigalaik Konduvandhaargal.
25 gnaana Irudhayamulla Sthireegal Ellaarum Thangal Kaigalinaal Nootru, Thaangal Nootra Ilaneelanoolaiyum Raththaambara Noolaiyum Sivappunoolaiyum Melliya Panju Noolaiyum Konduvandhaargal.
26 endha Sthireegaludaiya Irudhayam Gnaana Ezhuppudhal Adaindhadho, Avargal Ellaarum Vellaattu Mayiraith Thiriththaargal.
27 pirapukkal Epoththilum Maarppadhakkaththilum Padhikkum Komedhakam Mudhaliya Raththinangalaiyum,
28 parimalavarkkangalaiyum, Vilakkenneyaiyum, Abishega Thailaththukkum Sugandhavarkka Thoobaththukkum Vendiyavaigalaiyum Konduvandhaargal.

29 seyyappadumbadi Karththar Moseyaik Kondu Karpiththa Velaikkuriya Yaavaiyum Konduvara, Isravel Puththirarukkul Thangal Irudhayaththil Urchaagamadaindha Sthiree Purushar Yaavarum Karththarukkuk Kaanikkaiyai Manappoorvamaaik Konduvandhaargal.
30 pinbu Mose Isravel Puththirarai Nokki: Paarungal, Karththar Yoodhaavin Koththiraththil Oorin Maganaana Ooriyin Kumaaran Pesaleyelaip Persolli Azhaiththu,
31 avan Visiththiramaana Velaigalai Yosiththuch Seyyavum, Ponnilum Velliyilum Vengalaththilum Velaiseyyavum,
32 raththinangalai Muththirai Vettaaga Vettip Padhikkavum, Maraththil Siththira Velai Seydhu Sagala Vinodhamaana Velaigalaich Seyyavum,
33 avanukku Gnaanaththaiyum Buththiyaiyum Arivaiyum Aruli, Avan Sagalavidha Velaigalaiyum Seyyumbadi Dhevaaaviyinaale Avanai Nirappinaar.
34 avan Irudhayaththilum, Thaankoththiraththu Akisaamaakin Kumaaranaagiya Akoliyaapin Irudhayaththilum, Podhikkum Varaththaiyum Arulinaar.

35 siththiravelaiyaiyum Sirpavelaiyaiyum, Ilaneelanoolaalum Raththaambaranoolaalum Sivappunoolaalum Melliya Panjunoolaalum Seyyappadum Visiththirath Thaiyalvelaiyaiyum, Sagala Visiththira Nesavu Velaigalaiyum Vinodhamaana Velaigalai Yookikkiravargalum Seygiravargalum Niraivetrum Sagalavidha Velaigalaiyum Seyyumbadikku Avargaludaiya Irudhayaththai Gnaanaththinaal Nirappinaar Endraan.
